QuestData.Title: Talk to Ogron
QuestData.Description: I know this human, Paval Reethe. Pathetic, even for his kind. He deserted his fellow soldiers and is now hiding out in the woods.$b$bI sent Ogron out to track him down. Some of the others suspect he's been stealing from our supplies. I think I saw Ogron heading off to the southeast.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Ogron to the southeast of Brackenwall Village.
QuestData.RewardText: Ogron? Yeah, that me.$B$BShh. Keep voice down. Crocs hear you.
